mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Poinset.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Has made application to become American consul in Sette; consular general in Paris was Barnet; is recommended by Gen. Kosciuscko; explains that Sette is important for wine exportation; cousin Gen. Poinset has offered to put up money for him; has friends in Bordeaux who can recommend him to Thompson and company of Baltimore.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1820 June 24, Sette, [France] to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
